author: nc1234
content:
Lodestar's assertoor CI test is failing since the introduction of blob schedule. We get 
```
[assertoor] time="2025-05-23T00:11:32Z" level=warning msg="upstream client error: error while fetching specs: failed to unmarshal data\njson: cannot unmarshal array into Go value of type string, retrying in 60 sec..." client=1-geth-lodestar module=consensus
```
because `getSpec` beacon api now returns array for blob schedule, which `go-eth2-client` is not handling properly. See issue https://github.com/attestantio/go-eth2-client/issues/230
Not sure if this will impact our interop testing
